bdd

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdd.Request

  • public class Request
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all the methods that make requests to the database

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        This method allows to connect to de data base
        Returns:
        Retruns the Connection to the database
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the connection has not been established

      • displayPilotTable

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList displayPilotTable()
        this method display the pilot table
        Returns:
        an Observable List with all the pilots of the data base, this type makes easier displaying the pilots in the view

      • updateFlightDuration

        public static boolean updateFlightDuration(int flightID)
        this method updates the flight duration if the flight is in progress
        Parameters:
        flightID - the flight we want to update the duration id
        Returns:
        if the duration has been updated

      • createUser

        public static boolean createUser(UserPost post,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String username,
                                 java.lang.Integer age,
                                 java.lang.String pwd)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        this methods is used for the registration of a user, the id is auto incremented. It checks if the new user username is not already taken, if it is there is no registration.
        Parameters:
        post - the new user post
        name - the new user name
        username - the new user username which must be unique
        age - the new user age
        pwd - the new user password which well be hashed in the bdd table
        Returns:
        if the registration has been completed
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the user has not been registered

      • createTieFighter

        public static boolean createTieFighter(TieModel model)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        this methods register a tie. Its id is auto incremented, it is initially functional and not in flight.
        Parameters:
        model - the model of the tie we are registering
        Returns:
        if the registration has been completed
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the tie has not been registered

      • assignFlight

        public static boolean assignFlight(int pilotID,
                                   int fighterID,
                                   java.lang.String mission,
                                   java.lang.String sStartDate,
                                   java.lang.String sEndRent)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        this method assign a pilot to a tie for a flight. the flight id is auto incremented. The end of the flight is not informed but there is the date of the end of the tie rent. The method checks if the pilot and the te are available and fit to fly. It also checks if the id corresponds to a pilot and not to an officer.
        Parameters:
        pilotID - id of the pilot assigned to the flight
        fighterID - id of the tie used for the flight
        mission - the name of the flight mission
        sStartDate - the start date of the flight
        sEndRent - the end date of the tie rent
        Returns:
        if the assignment has been registered
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the assignment has not been registered

      • InFlightUpdate

        public static boolean InFlightUpdate(int fighterID,
                                     int pilotID)
        this method is called in assignFlight. It updates automatically the pilot and tie availability indicating they are in flight.
        Parameters:
        fighterID - the id of the tie used for the flight
        pilotID - the id of the user assigned to the flight
        Returns:
        if the updates has been done

      • deleteUser

        public static int deleteUser(int id)
        this methods delete a user from the user table. But if the user was a pilot, his profile is not deleted from the pilot table thus his records still accessible. Deleted from the user table, he can't access to the application.
        Parameters:
        id - of the user who will be deleted from the user table
        Returns:
        if the removal has been done

        public static boolean modifyPilotAge(int id,
                                     int Age)
        this method modify the age of a pilot
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the pilot concerned
        Age - the new age of the pilot
        Returns:
        if the update has been completed

      • modifyUserPassword

        public static boolean modifyUserPassword(int id,
                                         java.lang.String newPwd)
        this method modify the password of a user. The password is hashed.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the user changing his password
        newPwd - the user new password
        Returns:
        if the update has been completed

      • username

        public static java.lang.String username(int id)
        this method collects a pilot username from his id
        Parameters:
        id - id of the pilot we are looking for
        Returns:
        the username linked to the pilot id

      • DoneFighterStatus

        public static boolean DoneFighterStatus(int id,
                                        FighterStatus Status)
        this method is called in the method flightDone(). It updates the tie status once the flight done.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the tie used for the flight
        Status - new tie status once the flight done
        Returns:
        if the update has been completed

      • DonePilotStatus

        public static boolean DonePilotStatus(int id,
                                      PilotStatus status)
        this method is called in the method flightDone(). It updates the pilot status once the flight done.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the pilot assigned for the flight
        status - new pilot status once the flight done
        Returns:
        if the update has been completed

      • displayHistory

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList displayHistory(int pilotID)
        this method display the flight history of a pilot
        Parameters:
        pilotID - the id of the pilot we want to see his history
        Returns:
        an Observable List with all the flights the pilot had done, this type makes easier displaying the history in the view

      • flightDone

        public static boolean flightDone(int id,
                                 PilotStatus Pstatus,
                                 FighterStatus Fstatus,
                                 int shipDestroyed)
        this method update the pilot and tie status once the flight done. It also updates the number of enemies ships the pilot destroyed
        Parameters:
        id - id of the flight done
        Pstatus - new status of the pilot assigned to the flight
        Fstatus - new status of the tie used for the flight
        shipDestroyed - number of enemies ships the pilots destroyed
        Returns:
        if the updates have been completed

      • logIn

        public static int logIn(java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String pwd)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        this method allows the user to connect to the application thanks to his username and password. First the method checks if the username exists, then if the password is the good one
        Parameters:
        username - username of the user who wants to connect
        pwd - the password entered by the user
        Returns:
        the id of the user if he succeed in connecting. Otherwise it returns -1
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there is an error in the authentication

      • post

        public static UserPost post(java.lang.String username)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        this method checks if the username of the user is in the user table and returns his post
        Parameters:
        username - username of the user we are focusing on
        Returns:
        the post of the user
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there is problem in the research

      • displayPilotAvailable

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList displayPilotAvailable()
        this methods displays all the pilots who are able to take a flight.
        Returns:
        an Observable List with all the pilots available to take a flight, this type makes easier displaying the pilots in the view

      • displayTieFighterAvailable

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList displayTieFighterAvailable()

        Returns:
        an Observable List with all the ties able to fly, this type makes easier displaying the tie in the view
